subject: Baseball
Race and Ethnicity
Hispanic-Americans
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Bud Selig has embraced baseball’s diversity when it has suited him, but the game has a history of exploiting Latin Americans, and is once again turning its back on them.
snippet: Commissioner Bud Selig has embraced baseball’s diversity when it has suited him, but the game has a history of exploiting Latin Americans, and is once again turning its back on them.
